title: crypto tools
description:
# Cryptography Ethical Hacking Tools The following list includes some of the most popular tools to test crypto implementations.
Name Description
aespipe Reads data from stdin and outputs encrypted or decrypted results to stdout.
argon2 The password hash
payloads: The following list includes some of the most popular tools to test crypto implementations.
Reads data from stdin and outputs encrypted or decrypted results to stdout.
The password hash Argon2, winner of PHC.
A simple Bash script designed to create encrypted macOS payloads capable of evading antivirus scanners.
